item.title: build a 64-bit operating system
item.description: In this blog we build our first 64-bit operating system using asm and C code. Problem Statement Task 1: Use the video links given below to build the 64 bit operating system. You can use the first video as learning example. Task 2: You need to print SEECS or NUST (logo or text) using the characters (alphabetic, *, and / etc on the screen as shown in the image attached) instead of OK text as shown in the video.
